name: Hero's LOVE Party
description:
The protagonist of this story dies after being run over by a truck, but a god offers them a deal. If they manage to save another world from the threat of the Demon God, they will be able to come back to life.

Will the protagonist be able to fulfill their mission and at the same time gain their party members' affection?

This demo includes the prologue and chapter 1 of the story!

Features
  • 4 different jobs to choose
  • 4 characters to interact with - the characters that appear in the story change depending on your job!
  • Pseudo-RPG Battle system
  • Love Points system
  • Texts both in English & Spanish
The team
  • Developer - Daniel Fernández Roncero
  • Writer - Lidia Concepción Echeverría
Credits

Degica - __STaR__ Asset Pack
'Red Chan' - Slime Monster Sprites
bitter sweet entertainment - Light Novel Standard Music
Metzik (Freesound) - Medieval Market Ambience
